@melstarry Yes, perhaps seed-planter rather than teacher is the role I‚Äôm looking for. 
‚ÄúSeed-planter of epistemic humility‚Äù
The loneliness of a long-term thinker.
I.e. Can institutions like primary schools, high schools and universities change their models so that they can hire inappropriate teachers like me?

This doesn't bother me personally in the short term as I don't need a job.

But it bothers me from a long-term perspective as I think people like me would be good teachers for my daughters and their friends.

The only job I can envision myself having is teaching.

But I'd need a 10yr contract with an educational institution to be able to convey what I know.

I.e. I'm unemployable.
